function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transition to stay-at-home precautions leading to changes in non-HVAC loads","Impact":"Increase in non-HVAC loads during stay-at-home period","Mitigation":"Implement energy-efficient technologies and promote energy conservation practices","Technologies":"Energy-efficient appliances, smart home automation, renewable energy systems","People":"Households across income ranges","Owner":"Utility companies, energy efficiency organizations"},{"Description":"Impact of pandemic on service industry and lower-income households","Impact":"Large increase in non-HVAC loads for lower-income households","Mitigation":"Provide financial assistance, job retraining, and support for affected industries","Technologies":"Online job training platforms, financial support programs, digital services for affected industries","People":"Lower-income households, service industry workers","Owner":"Government, non-profit organizations, employers"},{"Description":"Variations in non-HVAC loads due to pandemic affecting different income ranges","Impact":"Unequal impact on different income groups","Mitigation":"Equitable energy policies, financial support for affected households, and energy efficiency programs","Technologies":"Smart grid technologies, demand-side management, energy efficiency incentives","People":"Households across income ranges","Owner":"Government, utility companies, energy efficiency organizations"}]}
